snippet: Viral video of a senior Israeli Army officer striking a Danish man in the face with a rifle n the West Bank has drawn attention to an increasingly acrimonious struggle between the government of Israel and European rights activists who travel to the...
abstract: Viral video of a senior Israeli Army officer striking a Danish man in the face with a rifle n the West Bank has drawn attention to an increasingly acrimonious struggle between the government of Israel and European rights activists who travel to the region.

headline.main: Israeli Anger at Foreign 'Provocateurs' Boils Over
